title: Processes - Diff Eq Separation of Variables

content.question: What are all solutions to the differential equation <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, secant squared of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>sec</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="y equals, tangent x, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="y equals, secant x, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>sec</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="y equals, one third times, secant cubed of x, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><msup><mrow><mi>sec</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="y equals, 2 times secant squared of x, times tangent x, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>sec</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>x</mi><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="y equals, tangent x, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 7.6: Finding General Solutions Using Separation of Variables

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
